name: Tokyo Revengers Pazuribe!
storyline: Tokyo Revengers Puzzle is a match-3 game where you will have to form the best possible team. The cast of characters to choose from includes, of course, those in the story, and they will face off against other gangs for control of the streets. In this connect-3, the tiles you link will attack the enemies, but they will also add up so that a same-type character of your team can attack. Hence, you will have to make sure that your team in Tokyo Revengers Puzzle is well-balanced and leveled up.
summary: Tokyo Revengers: Pazuribe! is the official Tokyo Revengers game designed for smartphones on iOS and Android. It is a puzzle game with multiple sub-stories loosely based on the anime adaptation.
